reviews.text: Taste of Germany! My wife is German and it was fun to eat here. The schnitzel was soooo good, especially with the mushroom sauce. Beef cheek is a must too. I particularly loved the appetizers of bread that you dip and cheese sauce and the potato salad. Very good!
Everything was great! The atmosphere really felt like in Germany, the waitresses are very nice and friendly. The food is delicious, I ate bratwurst sausages, highly recommended!
Nothing but amazing! Food was so delicious and well made. Really good prices too. The people working there really friendly and great. So glad we tried it!!

This was our best meal in Vilnius. First of all it was incredibly delicious. My dish - veal with mushrooms and potatoes - taste was literally like at home cooked by my mom üòÄ
Second important point was amazing service - the server was so attentive, entertaining, has great people skills and of course a great knowledge of menus - both food and wine.
Third important point was the location and beautiful views - it was very warm and we had a table outside the restaurant.
We had a great experience and wish you the same.

Amazing German food , the only way to get the true German restaurant experience in the middle of Vilnius old town . Excellent service and care from restoyrans staff.  Food varies from super tasty sausages to really nice seafood dishes . Also great selection of German beers . Prices are not low but half of the dishes are big enough for two people. Would suggest sausage platter and  'karka' . Deserts were tasty as well .
